name: Legs Outta Line
description:
The Year is 3027

Earth is no more - Humanity has stretched across the stars in search of a new home. New innovations in technology have allowed the wealthy to reach the far edges of space.

There, they devour planets for resources using workers stationed on nearby habitable planets.

One of these workers, Pat, is running short for time - He's expected at dinner no later than 6PM.

After an unfortunate visit to the robotics lab - a critical malfunction has occurred.

Will Pat arrive home on time? Can he save his marriage?

---
Legs Outta Line is a 2D platformer that doesn't let you jump!

Well, that's not entirely accurate. It doesn't let you jump on purpose.
Our hero's cybernetic legs are on the fritz and will boost him automatically 
every 2 seconds.

You'll have to time your movements carefully to get the most out of Pat's jumps and survive all 3 levels! If you're up to it, see if you can bring all 5 flowers home to your partner!

Controller support works. We think.

Legs Outta Line was created by Studio Hip Sword for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.
Studio Hip Sword are:

Saylor O'Malley - Level Design
Rhys Angelo-Jones - Programming
Brett Ruys (aka Lunchbillion) - Art
Yogev Sitton - Music

8-Bit Sound Effects by Beep Yeah!
Humble Fonts Gold by somepx
